description: The first book in the Harry Potter series makes the perfect introduction to the world of Hogwarts.
title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

description: The first book in the Dark Tower series introduces readers to Roland of Gilead and his quest to find the Dark Tower.
title: The Gunslinger

description: The first book in the Lord of the Rings series follows Frodo Baggins as he sets out on a quest to destroy the One Ring.
title: The Fellowship of the Ring

description: The first book in the A Song of Ice and Fire series introduces readers to the world of Westeros and the power struggles between noble families.
title: A Game of Thrones
